text: Adubu hannana laklaba9:11 atoppa ariba lairik kharadadi “Lakkadaba” haina yao-i. aphaba maramsing adugidamak Christtana Purohitlen oina hannana lakkhre. Ibungona thougal touba phisang adudi henna chao-i amadi henna mapung phai amasung mioibagi khutna saba natte amadi semkhraba taibangpan asigi saruk ama natte.
